definition: to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"

sentences.english: And you'd have to kind of weed out who's singing what in the harmonies.
sentences.chinese: 于是你就感觉要逐一细听是谁在唱哪个和声。

sentences.english: On the grass, grasshoppers singing near by them with gi gi zi zi .
sentences.chinese: 草地上，唧唧织织的草蜢不时在旁和声高唱。

sentences.english: KaDing harmonic issa rice good again, they start to understand opposed.
sentences.chinese: 卡丁和声伊萨稻好如初，他们开端懂僚美妙将来。

sentences.english: At the same time he will do electronic manipulations with the sounds.
sentences.chinese: 谢子山将演奏爪哇的雷造的独特和声。

sentences.english: Singing both solo and acappella with rich harmonies was also part of the slave heritage.
sentences.chinese: 独唱和伴随着丰富和声的合唱也是奴隶传统的一部分。

sentences.english: Now the harmony has been destroyed.
Singers give support to each other as the singing turns into two-part, then three-part harmonies.
sentences.chinese: 曲中，和声会先转成二部，然后再分成三部。

sentences.english: I heard our harmonies resounding from the stadium's giant speakers.
sentences.chinese: 我听到我们的和声在体育馆巨大的喇叭中回响。

sentences.english: Can you come up with a visual image of how harmony works?
sentences.chinese: 你们能想出和声运作的视觉影像吗？

sentences.english: It's also true to pay attention to fostering aesthetic consciousness in teachers' college.
sentences.chinese: 作为高师和声课教学，也应重视对审美意识的培养。

sentences.english: Ultrasound wave has been widely utilized in various industries for its physical and sonochemistry effects.
sentences.chinese: 超声波具有多种物理和声化学效应，应用广泛。

sentences.english: He's also singing harmonies on the song.
So what's happened to the rate of harmonic change here?
sentences.chinese: 所以说这里的和声变化率是怎样的？

sentences.english: Harmony is to the harp as the mind is to the body.
sentences.chinese: 和声对于竖琴就像精神对于身体。

sentences.english: The six harmonies exercise is a diligent full body tai chi routine.
sentences.chinese: 六是一个勤奋的和声练习太极拳例行全身。

sentences.english: If there is concord, both notes must have the same speed.
sentences.chinese: 如果有和声存在，两个声音必须有相同的速度。

definition: to perform on a musical instrument
vocal accompaniment/to accompany a singer/to support of sb/to echo sb/to chime in with sb
part (in multi-part instrumental or choral music), such as the soprano part or bass part
